title: Abyssal Scepter.
body: For all of you building this item first when you play mid, please stop. You keep ruining my games with your no damage BULLSHIT, the rest of ur team is AD. Stop playing like a pussy in mid lane and dish out some damage. That is all.

replies.body: {{champion:7}} "I couldn't agree more. Mid laners need to stop with the bullshit."
{{champion:105}} "It's just an unfun item to deal with."

Who is it being built on?
Who is it being built against?

Only offering fringe notes for your game doesn't do much to sell me on the 'Don't buy item because I said so' advertisement you have going.

May I please have more information so I might better understand your realization?
